Reviews.Title: Could Not Complete Installation of software
Reviews.Author: Dwight L. Pelton
Reviews.Content: Software install failed. Web site was no help.  Phone calls unanswered.  I am not a novice at installing software but I could not make this one work.  Amazon was great with return product process.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: I wish everyone can go buy the Camera, I am a peasant, and if a peasant can set up the camera in less than 2 hours. I know you all could, Please go ahead and buy the product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes 4 High-Resolution Weatherproof Cameras with 960H/700TV Lines of Resolution
Each camera provides up to 100ft. of night vision
Comes with a Pre-installed 1 TB Hard Drive
Remote Internet monitoring (up to 10 users at the same time)
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC or PC, iPhone, iPad, or Android. Receive email alerts upon motion detection
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QT5682-4E3-1 8 Channel Full 960H System with 4 High-Resolution 960H/700TVL Cameras and 1TB Hard Drive (Gray)
